column5: Welcome text before and during the race is "Hi <name>! Have a good running!"
Welcome text after the runner last run is "Congratulation, well done!"
Welcome text after the team race is "All done, well done!"
Data fetched by using /currentRunner endpoint
If the team has not yet started the race, "The team has not yet started" is displayed instead of the name
If the team has already finished its race, the text "The team has finished the race" is displayed
In any other situation the runner's name is displayed
The time difference is shown in right time format
"ahead of schedule" caption is displayed, when the time difference is positive, "behind schedule"  when negative
Data fetched by using /nextRun endpoint

Section shows all the details of the next run of the selected runner (length of the runner's next run (stage) in km, time remaining until the next run, name of the starting location, the planned handover time (starting location), name of previous runner, handover button 1, name of the finishing locationm, the planned handover time (finishing location), name of thenext runner, handover button 2)
column7: deduct 0,2 for each missing part

column5: If the selected runner  finished all his/her running (stages) “No more running” text should be displayed instead of stage length
If there is more than 1 day to go, the total number of days remaining is displayed.
counter is updated continuously without refreshing the browser window
Handover button for starting location is active and clickable if the value of canStart is true and inactive if canStart is false.

If the selected runner will run the first stage (and has not yet started their run), the “Start race” button at the top of the screen will be displayed. For other runners the button will be “Handover now”.
handover button for finishing location is active only if the selected runner already started his run on that stage and inactive otherwise
column7: deduct 0,5 for each error

column5: Handover buttons should not be displayed if there is more than one day to go until the next run of the selected runner
column7: deduct 0,5 for each error

column5: /handover/start  and handover/finish is used properly
column7: deduct 0,5 for each error

column5: /nextRun and /currentRunner endpoints need to be polled every 10 seconds, and after every handover action
column7: deduct 0,5 for each error (e.g. polling interval is wrong, polling withoutrefreshing the UI, no polling after handover)
